info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Alexander, central Caldwell and central Burke Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Lenoir, or near Hudson, moving northeast at 10 mph. Other strong storms were near Morganton and Valdese. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Morganton, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Valdese, Gamewell, Hudson, Cajah`s Mountain, Drexel and Connelly Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
